course_description: Prerequisites: BIOS 500 and (BIOS 544 or BIOS 545 or EPI 534) or permission of instructor. The elective course gives an introduction to machine learning techniques and theory, with a focus on its use in practical applications. The Applied Machine Learning course teaches you a wide-ranging set of techniques of supervised and unsupervised machine learning approaches using R as the programming language.
prerequisites: BIOS 500 and (BIOS 544 or BIOS 545 or EPI 534) or permission of instructor required prior to enrollment.
schedule_location: T 10am-11:50am in Grace Crum Rollins TBA
